name: Police Chief Jedediah Chadwick
occupation: Chief of the Arkham Police Department
traits: Bulldog-faced, chews on unlit cigars, speaks in gruff monosyllables.
motivation: Maintain order and keep Arkham's respectable facade intact, even if it means sweeping things under the rug.
secret: In 1908, he was the only surviving officer of a raid on a farmhouse outside Arkham. He officially reported a gas explosion, but he knows something came out of the well.
hook: The investigators need police reports or are being warned off a case by the authorities.
